title: New: xxyyxx – Love Isn’t Made (Feat. Steffaloo)
content:
Marcel Everett aka xxyyxx is blowing up at the moment, there’s no doubting that.

With a collaboration with Giraffage and REID on it’s way, it’s clear that 2012 is going to be his year. This new cut featuring the ever splendid vocals of Steph Thompson, otherwise known as Steffaloo sees Everett upping his game with a minimal, repetitive beat underpinned by the delicate, sparsely sampled vocals. If we ever needed confirmation of just how far both these artists have come in such a short space of time, then Love Isn’t Made may well just be it.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
